pkgmetadata.longdescription: Exploratory Analysis of Tabular Data using Colour Highlighting // Tools for exploratory analysis of tabular data using colour highlighting. Highlighting is displayed in any console supporting 'ANSI' colours, and can be converted to 'HTML', 'typst', 'latex' and 'SVG'. 'quarto' and 'rmarkdown' rendering are directly supported. It is also possible to add colour to regular expression matches and highlight differences between two arbitrary R objects.
